Testimonial.Headline: Living Science Named Finalist for STEM Education Award
Testimonial.Description: During a live webcast, Living Science Home Studies was nominated as a finalist for a STEM education award, by the Technology Association of Georgia (TAG)
Testimonial.TestimonialText: ...we have started STEM in the Middle and High School and we need to promote that, Georgia needs the jobs and we have a good idea about the students that will fill them...

Testimonial.Headline: Favorite Places 3
Testimonial.TestimonialText: ...I see a lot of young people that do not know the meaning of "Be still", everything in their lives is "hurry up"...
